mapper.select: select base.* from t_ods_minbu base join t_ods_minbu_emp ome on base.littleXwCode=ome.littleXwCode where ome.littleEmpsn=#{empSn}
select * from t_ods_minbu base where ptCode like "%"#{ptCode}"%" and xwType5Code != '|2|'
select * from t_ods_minbu base where ptCode like "%"#{ptCode}"%" and xwType5Code = '|2|'

select littleXwMasterCode from t_ods_minbu base where ptCode like "%"#{ptCode}"%" and xwType5Code != '|2|' and littleXwCode in
#{item}

select o.id,o.xwCode,SUBSTR(substring(o.xwName,4) ,1 , CHAR_LENGTH(substring(o.xwName,4))-4) as xwName,o.xwMasterCode,o.xwMasterName,o.littleXwCode,o.littleXwName,o.littleXwMasterCode,o.littleXwMasterName, o.ptCode,o.ptName,o.xwType3,o.xwType5,o.xwType3Code,o.xwType5Code,o.userXwCode,o.userXwName,o.create_time from t_ods_minbu o LEFT JOIN z_node_target_percent_info t on t.node_code=o.littleXwCode and o.xwType3Code like '%|4|%' and o.xwType5Code like '%|2|%' where t.lq_code=#{chainCode}
select xwName,littleXwName from t_ods_minbu base where ptCode like "%"#{ptCode}"%" and xwType5Code != '|2|'
select base.* from t_ods_minbu base where base.littleXwCode=#{orgCode}

select * from t_ods_minbu a where a.littleXwCode not in (select node_code from z_node_target_percent_info b where b.share_percent is not null and b.lq_code=#{chainCode}) and a.ptCode like "%"#{ptCode}"%" and a.xwType5Code != '|2|'

select * from t_ods_minbu a where a.littleXwCode not in (select node_code from z_node_target_percent_info b where b.share_percent is not null and b.lq_code=#{childchainCode} and b.parent_chain_code=#{parentChainCode}) and a.ptCode like "%"#{ptCode}"%" and a.xwType5Code != '|2|'

SELECT e.`empSn`, e.`empName`, e.`posName`, e.`nodeCode`, p.`littleXwCode`, bu.`xwCode` FROM t_ods_minbu bu JOIN t_ods_minbu_emp p ON bu.`littleXwCode` = p.`littleXwCode` JOIN sys_employee_ehr e ON p.`littleEmpsn` = e.`empSn` WHERE bu.`littleXwMasterCode` = #{xwMasterCode}
and (e.`empSn` like "%"#{keyword}"%" or e.`empName` like "%"#{keyword}"%")
select * from t_ods_minbu base where xwType3Code like "%"#{XwType3Code}"%" and xwType5Code != '|2|'
